name: Casual Chess
description:
Play a game of chess and make a move any time you want. Invite your friends or play against a random opponent.

- Play move by move
- Uses Game Center for match making
- Turn based gameplay
- Publish the Game
- Send Draw Offers
- Notation with figurines
- Support for portrait and landscape orientation
- Navigate throught the game played so far
- Universal application
- Optimized for new devices
- Sounds notification when it is your turn
- Picture of opponent displayed

Enjoy.
